title: Zombie High Back 2 Class
description: Tidus has been sentenced to spend his final two years of high school in Ford High: School of the Misbehaved and Unruly. The jocks in this maximum security high school are a lot more aggressive, the cheerleaders are a lot more heartless and the nerds use their brains for crime. Tidus' attempt to simply keep his head down and graduate is thrown off track when a zombie outbreak occurs. It's a school of misfits versus the walking dead.This short is a sequel to the popular book, Zombie High
author: Kevin Anthony
